description.zh-cn: 中国战国中期思想家、哲学家、文学家，道家学派的代表人物。
道家学派的创始人，其思想对庄周产生了深远影响。
description.en: Founder of the Taoist school of thought, whose ideas profoundly influenced Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个思想流派，以老子和庄周为主要代表人物。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought, with Laozi and Zhuangzi as its main representatives.

description.zh-cn: 中国的本土宗教，深受道家思想影响，后将庄周尊为南华真人。
description.en: An indigenous Chinese religion, deeply influenced by Taoist philosophy, which later revered Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期的儒家代表人物，与庄周大约同时代。
description.en: A representative of Confucianism during the Warring States period, a contemporary of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国，庄周的故国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty in China, the home state of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 庄周的出生地，位于宋国境内。
description.en: Zhuang Zhou's birthplace, located within the State of Song.

description.zh-cn: 庄周曾担任小吏的地方。
description.en: A place where Zhuang Zhou once served as a minor official.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，追封庄周为南华真人。
description.en: Emperor of the Tang Dynasty who posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝皇帝，追封庄周为微妙元通真君。
description.en: Emperor of the Song Dynasty who posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as Weimiao Yuantong Zhenjun.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期魏国君主，与庄周同时代。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Wei during the Warring States period, a contemporary of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期齐国君主，与庄周同时代。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Qi during the Warring States period, a contemporary of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期名家代表人物，庄周的好友。
description.en: A representative of the School of Names during the Warring States period, a good friend of Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期楚国君主，曾邀请庄周出任宰相。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Chu during the Warring States period, who once invited Zhuang Zhou to be chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 道家经典，为庄周及其后学所著，后被唐玄宗封为《南华经》。
description.en: A classic text of Taoism, authored by Zhuang Zhou and his followers, later titled 'Nanhua Jing' by Emperor Xuanzong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个思想流派，庄子对其部分主张持批评态度。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought, some of whose tenets were criticized by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个思想流派，庄子反对其以法律治国的主张。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought, whose advocacy of rule by law was opposed by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 儒家学派的创始人，庄子曾借盗跖之口对其进行批评。
description.en: The founder of the Confucian school of thought, who was criticized by Zhuangzi through the voice of the character Robber Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 晋代学者，曾注释《庄子》，可能对现存版本进行过删减。
description.en: A scholar of the Jin Dynasty who commented on the Zhuangzi and may have abridged the extant version.

description.zh-cn: 庄子的思想继承和发展了老子的思想，其学说要本归于老子之言。
description.en: Zhuangzi's thought inherited and developed Laozi's thought; his doctrine is fundamentally based on Laozi's words.

description.zh-cn: 庄子的思想对后世道教的形成和发展产生了影响。
description.en: Zhuangzi's thought influenced the formation and development of later Taoism (religion).

description.zh-cn: 庄周与孟子是同时代的人物。
description.en: Zhuangzi and Mencius were contemporaries.

description.zh-cn: 庄子为宋国蒙人。
description.en: Zhuangzi was a native of Meng in the state of Song.

description.zh-cn: 庄周曾担任漆园的小官吏。
description.en: Zhuangzi once served as a minor official in the Lacquer Garden.

description.zh-cn: 于天宝初年下诏，追封庄周为南华真人。
description.en: In the early Tianbao era, he issued an edict to posthumously honor Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 追封庄周为“微妙元通真君”。
description.en: Posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as 'Weimiao Yuantong Zhenjun'.

description.zh-cn: 庄周与魏惠王是同时代的人物。
description.en: Zhuangzi and King Hui of Wei were contemporaries.

description.zh-cn: 庄周与齐宣王是同时代的人物。
description.en: Zhuangzi and King Xuan of Qi were contemporaries.

description.zh-cn: 庄周和惠施交好。
description.en: Zhuangzi and Hui Shi were good friends.

description.zh-cn: 曾派人邀请庄周为楚国宰相。
description.en: Once sent emissaries to invite Zhuangzi to serve as the chancellor of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 以“泥中之龟”为喻，拒绝了楚威王的邀请。
description.en: He refused King Wei of Chu's invitation using the metaphor of a 'turtle in the mud'.

description.zh-cn: 创作了《庄子》一书，阐述其哲学思想。
description.en: Authored the book 'Zhuangzi' to expound his philosophical ideas.

description.zh-cn: 批评儒家的“仁义”违背人性，反对其等级观念和礼法治国。
description.en: Criticized Confucian concepts of 'benevolence and righteousness' as being against human nature, and opposed its hierarchical concepts and rule by rites.

description.zh-cn: 反对法家以法律治国的主张。
description.en: Opposed the Legalist proposition of governing by law.

description.zh-cn: 借盗跖之口批评孔子是“鲁之巧伪人”。
description.en: Through the voice of the character Robber Zhi, criticized Confucius as a 'cunning and hypocritical man of Lu'.

description.zh-cn: 在晋代注释《庄子》，可能在编辑过程中删去部分篇章，形成了现存的33篇版本。
description.en: Commented on 'Zhuangzi' during the Jin Dynasty and may have deleted some chapters during the editing process, resulting in the extant 33-chapter version.
